Class: CSSToggle

CSSToggle(element, on, attack, release, effectClass, parameter)

CSSToggle Control a CSS property with a toggle to replace over-complex SVG animations

Constructor

new CSSToggle(element, on, attack, release, effectClass, parameter)

Parameters:
Name Type Description
element HTMLElement
on boolean
attack number
release number
effectClass string
parameter string
Source:
  • classes/CSSToggle.js, line 17
Example
let toggle = new CSSToggle(document.querySelector('rect'), false, 0.1, 0.3, 'hc--light', 'fill');
